title: Low Priority (5min Penalty) + Network Recconecting
body:
Hello Everyone, 
yesterday I've played with my big brother. while playing, I had a network shut-down
at all of my neighborhood (pch-blck). After several min' my Router brought back to life
and while I tried to log back in, I've got for the first time a Low-Priority-Penalty.
Further more while im tryin' to wait those 5min, I get like a "Kicked in the head" when the clock Finished his 5'-min.
Its gettin' frustrating after the 1Hour 5min after 5min..
cant log to an ARAM/normal/ranked game without this "attempting to reconnect" that killing me.

What Should I Do?

Thank you for the Support.
